definitions.label: Commercial Transportation (Federal)
definitions.description: Transportation of passengers or property for compensation or in furtherance of a commercial enterprise, typically in interstate commerce.
signals: For-hire carriage of goods or passengers
Use of commercial motor vehicle as defined by FMCSA
Business or corporate carriage tied to profit

definitions.label: Private Movement
definitions.description: A natural person traveling for personal, family, or non-commercial purposes, not acting as a motor carrier or commercial operator.
signals: No freight, no passengers for hire
